nodes.text: Ash Moon 1 was a moon located in the Kartovian Formation. A Central Isopter deathshrine was located on the moon. When the Central Isopter pilgrims shot down one of the Galactic Empire's Project Swarm probe droids, General Maximilian Veers investigated the moon for rebel activity. When the team arrived, they discovered it had been the pilgrims who shot down the probe, and Veers had the stormtrooper platoon use them as target practice.
